text:
After learning from HubSpot Academy
Just download the free template from Marketplace & go through its Coded File or Module File.
This will help you to grasp the basics of creating a website.
BTW, From which Country you are?

Sorry for the late response here :slightly_smiling_face:
Welcome <@ULQGK1Y2D> - we're really excited to have you a part of the HubSpot developer community! :bmo:

All the best resources are in:
> - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>
> - <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development>
> - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery>
> - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/open-source>
David and I are in US - David's on the east coast, I'm on the west coast.

Don't be Sorry. It may be due to different time Zone.
BTW, I got your reply at correct Time.
Thanks alot for allowing me to Join your Community.
of course! Always love having new developers be a part of the HubSpot world :slightly_smiling_face:
